data.text:
@PeterPa95709800 Hi! Please find our contact details regarding this here: https://t.co/iBiPP8x98k

Kind regards, Rebecka

@devildetail Hi! You can find our contact details here: https://t.co/iBiPP8x98k

Kind regards, Rebecka

@LumsdenAndrew Hi, when you have a ticket that mixes other airlines than SAS or Widerø, you will need to purchase additional bags at the airport. This is because we cannot promise the service of the bag for other airlines than SAS or Widerø.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@djulius Hello! 
Does the new password meet these requirements:
1 lowercase letter
1 uppecase letter
1 number
1 special character
A total of 8 characters
The password can’t match your email?

Kind regards, Anja!

data.text:
@creme_et_beurre Hej!
Alla recenärer från 6 år behäver bära munskydd när de reser med SAS.

Vi som flygbolag har inga test- eller vaccinationskrav, men personalen vid gaten kommer att kontrollera dina resehandligar om det land du reser till kräver detta.  
Tack för att du kontaktar oss, Anja!

data.text:
@superwanderman @superwanderman we apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact us via Facebook messenger, the live chat or by calling us and we can help you update your profile https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Best regards, Mikael.

@marcnoruega @marcnoruega om du har en återbetalningsbar voucher, så kan du ordna med återbetalning efter voucherns giltighetstid gått ut. Kontakta oss via Facebook messenger, live chatten eller telefon så kan vi kolla upp vilken typ av voucher du har.
Med vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

data.text:
@konstighet Hej! När du reser i SAS plus inom Europa på flyg som är över 80 minuter lång så har vi ofta möjligheter att lägga till vegansk kost. Reser du i SAS Go kan du kika på vilka måltider du kan köpa till din resa via Mina Bokningar. https://t.co/z4gOZAAJQJ
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

data.text: @blogdroed Hi, I suggest you call our support in order to see what options we have for your booking in terms of refund. You can find our phone numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj - Please select your region in the drop down menu and click on Customer Service / Eurobonus

data.text:
@Privatpersonen @Privatpersonen Jag beklagar att det inte går via sms. Då rekommenderar jag dig att logga in på din profil på vår hemsida https://t.co/83x76MtYnM Gå in på inställningar och sedan Kommunikation, så kan du avregistrera det där.
Med vänlig hälsning, Mikael

urls.title: Voucher – Travel the world
urls.description: With a SAS Voucher you can pay for flights, travel extras like lounge access and much more online. How it works »

data.text:
@HilaryWyles @HilaryWyles If your voucher is refundable, you can arrange a refund via our website https://t.co/ui2Ls6yWKm and Check Voucher Balance. When the voucher has expire (12 months after it was issued), there will be a link to claim your refund.
Best regard, Mikael.

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@ConsultantMud @ConsultantMud I understand, but it's the arrival service at the airport that can help you with these reports. You can find some numbers here https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM We apologize for any inconvenience.
Best regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@avella5787 @avella5787 I'm sorry to hear that you haven't heard from us yet, but I can't check cases via Twitter. Please use the form on our website https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh and choose the categories: Other - Customer Service - Get back on pending inquiry - Status
Best regards, Mikael

@gunnarhaarr Hej Gunnar, Så länge du bokar alla resenärer i en bokning, så kommer ni att få sitta med varandra, Även 30 timmar innan avresa öppnar våran online incheckning där du kan checka in för eran resa och välja sittplatser utan extra kostnad.

Vänliga hälsningar, Isak

data.text:
@mrsRganics @mrsRganics I'm sorry to hear that. To get an update about your case, please go to our website https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh Choose the categories: Other - Customer Service - Get back on pending inquiry - Status and we will reply to you as fast as possible.
Best regards, Mikael.

@mrsRganics @CallIrelands @rowney_andy @mrsRganics I'm sorry to hear you're having issues with your voucher. I can't check cases via Twitter. You can contact us via Messenger, the live chat or by phone so we can look into it. Otherwise, please wait for the reply from our customer care department.
Best regards, Mikael

Best regards, Mikael
